text: technically you could by making an api call every time you trigger an action, but the question is why would you want to do so?

you would either need to make it an open database and trigger the api on the frontend, or if it's a protected database then create a plugin/function that authenticates with the HubSpot account to make an api call to the hubdb
depending on the use case, it might also be worth investigating whether using custom objects would be better suited to your needs
